title: Launch A Project-Based Learning Course
description: Mindmap describing the steps to design, launch, and optimize a project-based online course.

nodes.label: Course Launch Blueprint
nodes.notes: High-level view of the entire launch plan.

children.label: Validate The Topic
children.notes: Make sure the topic solves a real pain point.

children.label: Learner Surveys
children.notes: Collect 20–30 survey responses to confirm demand.

children.label: Problem Interviews
children.notes: Run 5 interviews to capture language and objections.

children.label: Learning Outcomes
children.notes: List 4 measurable outcomes tied to portfolio pieces.

children.label: Signature Projects
children.notes: Design 2–3 projects that mirror real-world briefs.

children.label: Feedback Loops
children.notes: Define how peers + mentors give feedback.

children.label: Marketing & Enrollment
children.notes: Generate interest and convert qualified learners.

children.label: Prelaunch List
children.notes: Warm up an email list + social audience.

children.label: Launch Webinar
children.notes: Host a live session to demo the curriculum.

children.label: Enrollment Window
children.notes: Open cart for 10 days with scarcity messaging.

children.label: Learning Analytics
children.notes: Track completion, NPS, and project quality.

children.label: Iteration Cycle
children.notes: Improve content after each cohort retro.
